name: Robot must survive
description:
You are robot that living on dump, but some purple liquid arrived! You are trying to climb away from this liquid and beanstalks will help you with it.

You must climb to beanstalk and move between them with branches to survive. You can jump without branches 3 times.

Controls - WASD

Made with unreal engine 5 (Yes, it's overengineering, but we wanted to try it).
